overview: Smart girls get horny too! These scorching hot librarians are steaming up their glasses with erotic girl-on-girl action guaranteed to teach their protoges the sexiest lessons they'll ever learn. Each scene features an experienced book-loving hottie taking on an eager young student who wants to discover every experience possible between the stacks!
tagline: Horny teens, mature babes and the joys of reading.
title: Lesbian Librarians
